# privx_local_user_password (Resource)

Sets or resets a PrivX local user password

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "privx_local_user_password" "rotate" {
  user_id  = privx_local_user.test.id
  password = "new_password"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `password` (String, Sensitive) New password (write-only)
- `user_id` (String) Local user ID

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
